examples.question: A coin is heads up. Justin does not flip the coin. Neal does not flip the coin. Jt does not flip the coin. Lucia flips the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".
A coin is heads up. Carmelo flips the coin. Tony flips the coin. Susan flips the coin. Sara does not flip the coin. Is the coin still heads up? Note that "flip" here means "reverse".
